articles.description: England's Euro 2024 final against Spain is a game that can shape legacies and change lives forever, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Gareth Southgate: "England boss inherited a shambles but is one win from greatness'

articles.description: As Barbora Krejcikova stood with the Venus Rosewater Dish in her hands, there was one thing she could not stop saying - "it is just unbelievable".
articles.title: Wimbledon women's final 2024: Barbora Krejcikova thinks of Jana Novotna after 'unbelievable' title win

articles.description: Gareth Southgate says he is "not a believer in fairytales but is a believer in dreams" as he prepares to lead England in Sunday's Euro 2024 final against Spain at Berlin's Olympiastadion.
articles.title: Euro 2024 final: England boss Gareth Southgate 'not a believer in fairytales but in dreams'

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says "history will be on the line" when he faces Carlos Alcaraz in the Wimbledon men's singles final on Sunday.
articles.title: Wimbledon men's final: Novak Djokovic says 'history will be on the line' against Carlos Alcaraz

articles.description: Ireland captain Caelan Doris says there was "pure elation" after Ciaran Frawley's last-gasp drop goal secured a famous win over South Africa in Durban.
articles.title: South Africa 24-25 Ireland: 'Pure elation' after Ciaran Frawley's 'moment of genius'

articles.description: Henry Patten and Harri Heliovaara save three match points and beat Australians Max Purcell and Jordan Thompson in the Wimbledon men's doubles final.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Henry Patten and Harri Heliovaara win Wimbledon men's doubles title

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Spain vs England in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: England vs Spain: Euro 2024 Final preview, team news, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Australia's Stephanie Kyriacou heads into the final round of the Evian Championship with a one-shot lead.
articles.title: Evian Championship: Stephanie Kyriacou takes one-shot lead into final round

articles.description: Signs of progress but two narrow defeats by the All Blacks - where do England stand after their thrilling tour of New Zealand?
articles.title: New Zealand 24-17 England: Where do Steve Borthwick's side stand after summer tour?

articles.description: Barbora Krejcikova holds off a charge from Jasmine Paolini in a gripping Wimbledon final to earn her second Grand Slam singles title.
articles.title: Wimbledon results 2024: Barbora Krecjikova beats Jasmine Paolini in women's final
